translation.en: You think I missed?
Well…
Off by four inches.
-♪ I'm wanted… ♪ -[man] Hey, Ross. You got any more of these black tarps?
translation.it: Ehi, Rock, hai altri teloni neri?

translation.en: Hey, what do you think you're doin'? I wanted those.
Gotcha, Lou.
[Reagan] …and alleged ransom payments.
We did not, repeat, did not trade weapons or anything else for hostages,
translation.it: Ripeto, non abbiamo consegnato armi o qualsiasi altra cosa in cambio degli ostaggi, né lo faremo.

translation.en: nor will we.
translation.it: o qualsiasi altra cosa in cambio degli ostaggi, né lo faremo.

translation.en: President Reagan addressing the heightened tensions with Iran
translation.it: Il presidente Reagan sulle crescenti tensioni con l'Iran

translation.en: in the wake of rumors -about the CIA's involvement… -[echoing] Lou.
translation.it: in seguito a voci riguardanti il coinvolgimento della CIA

translation.en: …in the country's 1953 coup.
translation.it: nel colpo di Stato iraniano del 1953.

translation.en: -Hey, Lou. -[phone ringing]
In other news, pages from the Rogers Commission's report
translation.it: Altre notizie. Il rapporto della Commissione Rogers

translation.en: on the Space Shuttle Challenger disaster, with NASA under fire…
translation.it: sul disastro dello Space Shuttle Challenger, con la NASA criticata…

translation.en: You, uh, ready for the big storm?
Makin' a withdrawal.
And, uh, how much will you be taking out today?
Ah, whatever's in there.
-[Reagan] …special position in Iran… -Oh. Okay.
Without Iran's cooperation, we cannot bring an end to the Persian Gulf War.
translation.it: …se l'Iran non collabora, non possiamo porre fine alla guerra del Golfo.

translation.en: -Oh! That is, uh… -Without Iran's…
translation.it: Se l'Iran non… Sono… molti soldi.

translation.en: -There's a lot of money. -…relationship with…
I know. I'm the one who put it in there.
translation.it: Lo so. Ce li ho messi io.

translation.en: If you'd like to place a call, please deposit 25 cents before dialing.
translation.it: Per telefonare, depositate 25 centesimi prima di comporre il numero.

translation.en: If you need help, please hang up and try your call again.
translation.it: Se vi serve aiuto, riattaccate e provate di nuovo.

translation.en: Afternoon, Lou.
Jax is in a good mood.
Can't help but wonder if the spark of the hunt hasn't got him all worked up.
translation.it: Mi chiedo se la scintilla della caccia l'abbia eccitato.

translation.en: Unlikely. It isn't hunting season.
Deer must have just bolted out of nowhere.
Happened so fast.
Well, I'm glad you and Jax came out of it okay.
translation.it: Lieto che tu e Jax ve la siate cavati.

translation.en: You know, you ought to get yourself one of these copper bracelets.
translation.it: Comprati uno di questi braccialetti di rame.

translation.en: -Pretty. -My niece got it for me on the mainland.
translation.it: - Bello. - Me l'ha comprato mia nipote.

translation.en: One of those stores, you know, with the dream catchers and crystals and whatnot.
translation.it: Uno di quei negozi che vendono acchiappasogni, cristalli e così via.

translation.en: -[starts engine] -I laughed at her. But I swear to God, I barely feel the arthritis anymore.
translation.it: Ho riso di lei e, giuro su Dio, non soffro più d'artrite.

translation.en: I'm fishin' again.
Careful you don't get struck by lightning wearin' that thing.
-[woman] Oh, that's right. -Mornin', Lou!
-[man] Got your ticket? -[woman] Of course! I got my ticket. [man] Well, I'm gonna be--
translation.it: - Ho infornato la torta. - Beh, io…

translation.en: -[man] Bridget Hoffman-- -[woman] I love--
[man] This is a severe weather watch.
The biggest storm the Pacific Northwest has seen in years
translation.it: La più grande tempesta da anni e anni dovrebbe investire in serata il Pacifico di Nord-Ovest.

translation.en: is expected to make landfall early this evening.
translation.it: dovrebbe investire in serata il Pacifico di Nord-Ovest.

translation.en: Residents are encouraged to stay in their homes
translation.it: S'incoraggiano i residenti a non uscire

translation.en: and be prepared for downed power lines and flooding in low-lying areas.
translation.it: e a essere cauti, in caso di linee elettriche abbattute e allagamenti.

translation.en: Ferry service to the San Juan Islands has also been suspended until further notice
translation.it: I traghetti per le Isole San Juan sono sospesi fino a nuovo avviso,

translation.en: as the area is directly in the storm's path.
translation.it: trovandosi la zona sul percorso della tempesta.

translation.en: [woman] Where could she be? I don't know.
translation.it: Dove può essere? Non lo so.

translation.en: She's not under this tree.
She's not over here.
Oh, she's so good at hiding.
Gotta find her.
Maybe she's inside.
Yeah, I'm gonna check there.
-I got you! -[squeals] -I got you! I got you! -[laughing]
-[giggling] -You didn't say the code! Little Rabbit.
Oh! Little Rabbit, Little Rabbit! -Little Rabbit! -[both laughing]
One more time.
-No. -Please.
I said no, Vee. Come on.
translation.it: Ho detto di no, Vee. Andiamo.

translation.en: Pass me a nail?
Thanks.
Mom, do you think Daddy's gonna find the treasure soon?
translation.it: Mamma, pensi che papà troverà presto il tesoro?

translation.en: It's been two years.
I don't know, Vee. I bet he's real close.
translation.it: Non lo so, Vee. Penso che gli manchi poco.

translation.en: And then is Daddy gonna come home?
You know, the storm looks like it's a while away.
translation.it: Sai, la tempesta sembra ancora lontana.

translation.en: We could probably fit in another game.
I bet you can't make it past three minutes before I find you, though.
translation.it: Dico che non potrai nasconderti più di tre minuti.

translation.en: -Oh, I can. -Oh, I don't think you can. Mm-mm.
translation.it: - Certo che posso. - Io dico di no.

translation.en: All right. Let me see. Ready? Set…
translation.it: Va bene. Fammi vedere. Pronti? Attenti…

translation.en: -Game on! -[squeals] Game on!
One… two…
three… four…
five… six…
[sighs] Seven…
-Hey, Lou. -Rent. Tomorrow.
I know. Listen, now, I had to lay in supplies for the storm.
translation.it: Ho dovuto fare rifornimento per la tempesta, quindi mi chiedevo…

translation.en: -So I was wondering whether-- -No extensions.
-[sighs] All right. -Tomorrow. Inside. On the table.
translation.it: Va bene. Domani. In casa. Sul tavolo.

translation.en: It'll get wet in the mailbox. You'll get it.
translation.it: - O si bagnerà nella cassetta. - Lo avrai.

translation.en: [yells] Vee!
What the hell is wrong with you?
Why you gotta drive so goddamn fast? You know there's a child nearby.
translation.it: Perché guidi così veloce? C'è una bambina!

translation.en: World's not a playground. Teach your kid to look out for herself.
translation.it: Il mondo non è un parco giochi. Insegnale a stare attenta.

translation.en: Come on, Jax.
-[man] Hey. -[mother] Go inside.
-No, Mom! -Vee, go inside.
-Everything o-- okay? -[stamps]
And no stomping, little girl.
translation.it: E non pestare i piedi, ragazzina.

translation.en: [man] Heading into town to get some supplies. -Can I get you anything? -[sighs]
translation.it: Vado a fare provviste. Serve qualcosa?

translation.en: -No. We're fine. Thanks, Chris. -[door slams]
translation.it: No. Siamo a posto. Grazie, Chris.

translation.en: -You doin' all right? -[sighing] Yeah, I'm just tired.
translation.it: - Va tutto bene? - Sì, sono solo stanca.

translation.en: -[Chris] All right. -[sighs] [Chris] Is Lou still bein' a pain in your ass?
translation.it: Ok. Lou ti rompe ancora le scatole?

translation.en: -[sighs] I told you about that? -[chuckling] Yeah.
Yeah, you don't… you don't remember? -No. -[sighs]
-Look, we were both pretty drunk, so… -Yeah.
-Yeah. -Clearly, 'cause I… I don't remember that.
translation.it: - Sì. - Sì. Ovviamente. Perché non me lo ricordo.

translation.en: I do remember you singing "Like A Virgin" at the top of your lungs.
translation.it: Ricordo che cantavi "Like a Virgin" a squarciagola.

translation.en: Oh, please swear you'll never tell.
Or what?
I don't know.
Or, uh…
[Vee] Mom! I can't find Mr. Hippo!
translation.it: Mamma, non riesco a trovare Mr. Hippo.

translation.en: -Ah. -[chuckles] Listen, I gotta go.
Hey, have you, um…
-[Chris sighs] -[Vee] Mom, help me find him.
Have you had a chance to talk to Vee yet?
translation.it: Hai avuto l'occasione di parlare a Vee

translation.en: About her dad?
[Chris] You all right?
-Any way I could get a ride? -Yeah, of course. -Get in here. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Mi dai un passaggio? - Sì, certo. Sali.

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Thank you.
[grunts] Sorry about that.
[man] Oh, damn rental car broke down on me. You're a lifesaver. [laughs]
translation.it: L'auto a noleggio s'è rotta. Mi stai salvando la vita.

translation.en: Oh, jeez, I'm-- I'm gettin' your seat all soaked.
translation.it: Oh, cavolo! Ti sto infradiciando il sedile.

translation.en: Don't worry about it, man. I'm just glad I passed you when I did.
translation.it: Non fa niente. Fortuna che sono passato.

translation.en: -[man] Oh. -[Chris] The storm's gonna be gnarly.
Heavy reading.
Yeah, I bought it for a friend of mine.
Her ex died three months ago, and she's just-- she's havin' a hard time facin' it.
translation.it: Il suo ex è morto tre mesi fa. Fatica ad accettarlo e…

translation.en: I see. And you wanna help her face it, right? Hm?
translation.it: Capisco. E tu vuoi aiutarla, vero?

translation.en: 'Cause you wanna be more than just friends?
translation.it: - Vuoi essere più che un amico? - No, io… Ha una figlia.

translation.en: Oh, look, I just-- She has a kid. She wants to take it slow.
translation.it: - Vuoi essere più che un amico? - No, io… Ha una figlia. Vuole andarci piano.

translation.en: Oh! I love this band.
Oh, Jeff Porcaro's the man. -Oh, yeah. He's the best. -♪ …things that you say that you'll do ♪
translation.it: - Jeff Porcaro è un grande. - Sì. È il migliore.

translation.en: [Chris] Ah! Fuck! What the fuck?
-[sighs] -[thunder rumbling]
Vee…
Vee, look at me.
You know when you were asking about Daddy earlier?
translation.it: Ricordi quando hai chiesto di papà, prima?

translation.en: Well, um… [sighs]
Baby, he, um…
He loves you so much.
And he thinks about you all the time.
What are we making?
-Friendship bracelets. -Oh.
I wanna make a friendship bracelet.
This one is for Lou.
You're making a bracelet for Lou? Why?
translation.it: Fai un braccialetto per Lou? Perché?

translation.en: I like Lou.
-I know you don't. -Yeah, I do.
translation.it: - So che a te non piace. - Sì, invece.

translation.en: Okay. I actually don't like Lou. But why do you like her?
translation.it: Ok. È vero, Lou non mi piace, ma perché piace a te?

translation.en: Well, Jax likes her, and I like Jax.
translation.it: Beh, lei piace a Jax, e Jax mi piace.

translation.en: [Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.it: Non ho mai amato dilungarmi, quindi sarò breve.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
"There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.it: Nel freezer troverai carne per Jax per un mese e dei soldi per te.

translation.en: "There are certain decisions I made that you will never understand."
translation.it: Ho preso certe decisioni che tu non capirai mai.

translation.en: "But that's all in the past now."
"Life can be cruel."
translation.it: La vita a volte è crudele.

translation.en: "What made me great at some things made me lousy at others."
translation.it: Sono diventata brava in alcune cose e pessima in altre.

translation.en: "I wish I could say that some good came from what I did."
translation.it: Vorrei poter dire che dalle mie azioni è scaturito del bene.

translation.en: "In truth,
I left the world a more dangerous place."
translation.it: il mondo che ho lasciato è più pericoloso.

translation.en: -Bedtime, now! -[squealing]
translation.it: È ora di andare a letto! Ok.

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughs] My pillow! [sighs] Okay, lay down.
-Mr. Hippo! -I'm exhausted. Come on, Mr. Hippo.
translation.it: - Mr. Hippo! - Sono esausta. Andiamo, Mr. Hippo. Buonanotte.

translation.en: -Good night. -I'm hot.
translation.it: Andiamo, Mr. Hippo. Buonanotte. Ho caldo.

translation.en: Yeah, now I'm hot too. But you'll be cold soon because it's raining.
translation.it: Anch'io ho caldo, ma presto avrai freddo, perché piove.

translation.en: Oh, it's just the wind, baby. Don't be scared.
translation.it: È solo il vento. Non avere paura.

translation.en: -I'm not scared. -Okay.
translation.it: Non ho paura. - Ok. - Tu hai paura?

translation.en: -Are you scared? -Do you wanna sleep with me tonight?
translation.it: - Ok. - Tu hai paura? - Vuoi dormire con me stanotte? - Solo se vuoi.

translation.en: -Oh, if you need me to, I will. -I think I do.
translation.it: - Vuoi dormire con me stanotte? - Solo se vuoi. Credo di sì.

translation.en: Oh shit.
Shit, shit, shit, shit!
-Vee… -[chuckles]
-Watch your mouth. -Shit!
-Hey! -[lamp plays tune] Do not test my patience, little lady. [laughing]
translation.it: Non mettere alla prova la mia pazienza, signorina.

translation.en: I'm just gonna go flip the breaker.
I'll be right back, okay?
Mommy?
Is that you?
Oh! Vee!
[gasping] No! Vee!
Vee! Vee! Vee! Vee? Vee!
-Where's your phone? -What the hell?
Where's your goddamn phone? I gotta call the sheriff.
translation.it: Dov'è il telefono? Devo chiamare lo sceriffo.

translation.en: -[gasps] God damn it! Fuck! -[Lou] Slow down. What happened?
-[gasps] Vee's gone. -What, you let her wander off again?
translation.it: Vee è sparita. L'hai lasciata gironzolare? Non andrà lontano.

translation.en: -She's not gonna get far in this. -No, no, no.
translation.it: L'hai lasciata gironzolare? Non andrà lontano. No. L'ha presa suo padre.

translation.en: -Her father took her. -Her father?
translation.it: No. L'ha presa suo padre. Suo padre?

translation.en: He's… he's here. How the hell is he here?
translation.it: È qui. Come diavolo fa a essere qui?

translation.en: Hold on. You saw him?
No. I…
He… he's supposed to be dead, but he found us.
translation.it: Si pensava fosse morto, ma ci ha trovato.

translation.en: I-- I thought we were free of him.
translation.it: Credevo ce ne fossimo liberati. Ha ucciso Chris.

translation.en: -He killed Chris. -Jesus Christ.
translation.it: Credevo ce ne fossimo liberati. Ha ucciso Chris. Cristo.

translation.en: Where are your keys? The car won't start. I gotta get to the sheriff.
translation.it: Dove sono le tue chiavi? La mia auto non parte. Devo andare dallo sceriffo.

translation.en: -[Lou] I'll drive. -Okay.
Hm.
-[engine coughing] -No, no, no, no, no! Come on!
-What's wrong? -Run!
What?
-[melody plays] -[Lou] Down!
Ho-- how did you know it was gonna blow up?
Bombs tend to.
-[whining] -Sorry about that, buddy. Turns out I'm not done yet.
translation.it: Scusami, bello. Pare che non sia finita per me.

translation.en: A bomb? It means he's been plannin' this, Lou.
translation.it: Una bomba? Significa che ha pianificato tutto, Lou.

translation.en: We gotta get more help. We need to get to the sheriff.
translation.it: Ci serve aiuto. Andiamo dallo sceriffo.

translation.en: Can't get to him. No cars. Phones are down.
translation.it: Non è possibile. Né auto né telefoni.

translation.en: We're ten miles outside of town.
Your kid's gettin' further away by the second.
translation.it: Tua figlia si allontana di più ogni secondo. Devo rintracciarli.

translation.en: -I have to track 'em. -What?
translation.it: Tua figlia si allontana di più ogni secondo. Devo rintracciarli. Cosa?

translation.en: Track 'em? You?
[Lou] Get batteries. Kitchen.
You don't understand. Philip was a Green Beret.
translation.it: Non capisci. Philip era un Berretto Verde.

translation.en: Wanted for some terrible shit that he did in Central America.
translation.it: Ricercato per aver fatto cose terribili in America Centrale.

translation.en: War crimes kind of shit.
I saw the court transcripts. He was torturing hostages for fun.
translation.it: Ho letto le trascrizioni. Torturava ostaggi per divertirsi.

translation.en: He's highly trained. An explosives expert. Well, we're no match for him, Lou.
translation.it: È addestratissimo. Esperto di esplosivi. Non possiamo competere con lui.

translation.en: We need professional help. You and the dog ain't gonna cut it.
translation.it: Ci serve aiuto professionale. Tu e il cane non basterete.

translation.en: Did he take anything from your trailer?
translation.it: Ha preso qualcosa da casa tua?

translation.en: [mother] Her-- her favorite stuffy, Mr. Hippo.
translation.it: Il suo peluche preferito, Mr. Hippo, e una coperta.

translation.en: -And a-- a blanket. -He wants her comfortable.
translation.it: Il suo peluche preferito, Mr. Hippo, e una coperta. Vuole che sia a suo agio.

translation.en: He wants her quiet.
Renovations.
When they tried to arrest him, he blew his apartment up.
translation.it: Hanno cercato di arrestarlo e ha fatto saltare casa sua.

translation.en: They sent a death certificate. How the hell could he still be alive?
translation.it: C'è il certificato di morte. Come può essere vivo?

translation.en: [Lou] Halothane. Sleeping gas.
You're lucky it didn't knock you out.
translation.it: Per fortuna non ti ha messa k.o.

translation.en: [Lou] He's pullin' her in somethin'.
If he gets her off the island, this will get a lot messier.
translation.it: Se la porta via dall'isola, tutto sarà più difficile.

translation.en: Airport and ferry are closed.
Private vessel. He's headed to the coast.
translation.it: Battello privato. Va verso la costa.

translation.en: He's got a head start. I gotta move fast.
translation.it: È avvantaggiato. Devo andare veloce. Resta qui.

translation.en: Stay here. The storm clears, head into town.
translation.it: È avvantaggiato. Devo andare veloce. Resta qui. Finita la tempesta, va' in città. Prima casa, chiama lo sceriffo.

translation.en: First house you see, call the sheriff.
translation.it: Finita la tempesta, va' in città. Prima casa, chiama lo sceriffo.

translation.en: -Hey, where are you goin'? -To find my child.
translation.it: - Ehi, dove vai? - A trovare mia figlia.

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing.
If you slow me down, I will leave you behind.
translation.it: Se mi rallenti, ti lascio indietro.

translation.en: Jax. Right on.
[man] You can't see shit.
We're close. We're clearing the ridge. We'll be there shortly.
translation.it: Siamo vicini. Stiamo superando il crinale. Saremo lì a breve.

translation.en: -[thump] -[Philip] Fuckin' idiots.
translation.it: Saremo lì a breve. Razza d'idioti.

translation.en: No. No, no, no. It's okay.
I know it's been a while.
translation.it: So che è passato del tempo.

translation.en: Maybe this'll jog your memory.
Here's the church…
Here's the steeple…
Open it up and…
It's you.
Yes, it is. It's-- it's me.
It's me, sweetie.
You came back from your adventure.
I sure did.
And… and I even brought you a present.
translation.it: E ti ho anche portato un regalo.

translation.en: Is it part of the treasure?
Uh, treasure? Yeah!
Yeah, it sure is.
And… you and I are gonna go on our own adventure together.
translation.it: E io e te intraprenderemo la nostra avventura insieme.

translation.en: Where's Mo-- Where's Mommy? Is she coming with us?
translation.it: Dov'è la mamma? Viene con noi?

translation.en: Yeah, of course she is. Of course she is.
I left her a note and some clues to follow us,
translation.it: Le ho lasciato un biglietto e degli indizi per seguirci,

translation.en: and she's gonna meet up with us after, okay?
Uh-- Whoa.
What do you say?
Thank you, Daddy.
-Okay. -[man on radio] Do you copy?
Come on. Get on radio.
-Do you copy? -All right, I've gotta do one more thing.
And then you and I are gonna start our adventure together.
translation.it: Poi io e te inizieremo la nostra avventura.

translation.en: See, you put these on… All right, like that.
Okay?
[Lou] Here.
[mother] You see anything?
-[Lou] You know them? -Tony and Gerry. They served with Philip.
translation.it: - Li conosci? - Tony e Gerry. Hanno servito con Philip.

translation.en: They're just as vicious as he is. Come on.
Stay down. Your jacket might as well have a target painted on it.
translation.it: Stai giù. Con quella giacca sei un bersaglio troppo facile.

translation.en: -[sighs] -We wait.
Suppose this is just a distraction? Buying him more time to get away with Vee.
translation.it: E se fosse un diversivo? Prendersi più tempo per portar via Vee è il suo gioco.

translation.en: It's the kind of game he likes to play.
translation.it: Prendersi più tempo per portar via Vee è il suo gioco.

translation.en: Danglin' somethin' shiny in front of you,
and you don't notice when he's about to bash you over your goddamn head.
translation.it: e poi non ti accorgi quando ti fracassa la testa.

translation.en: [grunts] Do you know how to use this?
Mmm, yeah. [grunts]
translation.it: Sì. Ho preso lezioni dopo averlo lasciato.

translation.en: -I took lessons after I left him. -All right, I'm gonna go have a look.
translation.it: Sì. Ho preso lezioni dopo averlo lasciato. Ok, vado a dare un'occhiata.

translation.en: If anybody gets too close, use this.
translation.it: Se qualcuno si avvicina troppo, usa questo.

translation.en: Go for the eyes. A man can't kill what he can't see.
translation.it: Agli occhi. Uno non può uccidere ciò che non vede.

translation.en: -How do you know all this? -Girl Scouts.
translation.it: - Come fai a saperlo? - Girl Scouts.

translation.en: Jax. Stay.
[man 1] All right, no one's gonna follow him in this shit.
I'm telling you, this feels like another one of Philip's fucked-up games.
translation.it: Sembra un altro dei giochetti strambi di Philip.

translation.en: Hello?
Oh, excuse me. I'm completely turned around out here. I--
I… I was looking for my dog. The poor little guy--
translation.it: Cercavo il mio cane. Il poverino…

translation.en: I haven't seen any dogs.
translation.it: - Non ho visto nessun cane. - Ok.

translation.en: Okay. Do… do you have a phone I could use?
translation.it: - Non ho visto nessun cane. - Ok. Ha un telefono che posso usare? Vorrei…

translation.en: -I just want-- -Are you alone?
Unfortunately. Um…
Look, I-- I don't think I can make it the three hours back home, but…
translation.it: Non credo che potrei affrontare un viaggio di tre ore verso casa, ma

translation.en: if I could just rest and get my… my bearings?
translation.it: se solo potessi riposarmi e ritrovare l'orientamento.

translation.en: Christ.
-Okay. Just two minutes. -Oh!
Thank you so much.
Oh shit.
[Lou] Oh, bless your heart.
Oh, good morning.
She lost her dog, man. She's soaked.
translation.it: Ha perso il cane. È fradicia.

translation.en: Just need to get my blood movin' again.
My goodness. Quite a storm out there.
translation.it: Santo cielo. Che razza di tempesta.

translation.en: -Oh. -[man 2] What's your name?
Oh, sorry, I'm-- I'm Martha. Flemming.
But you might know my husband, Gordon.
translation.it: Forse conosce mio marito. Lavora al…

translation.en: -He works at the-- -I don't.
translation.it: Forse conosce mio marito. Lavora al… Non lo conosco.

translation.en: Here. Why don't you grab a seat?
-Give those cold feet a break. -They sure could use it.
translation.it: - Dia sollievo a quei piedi congelati. - Volentieri.

translation.en: Thank you.
[whispers] Thank you so much.
-Oof… -So… been on this island long?
-Oh, 32 years. -I don't get the appeal.
It's a pain in the ass to get to. -Weather's shit. [chuckles] -[sighs]
translation.it: È difficile arrivarci e il clima fa schifo.

translation.en: It's an acquired taste. [chuckles]
I love it, though.
-Good place to hide, I reckon. -Hmm.
Come on, Tony, relax. She's just an old lady.
translation.it: Tony, rilassati. È solo una vecchia.

translation.en: [breathing shakily] The soup smells so good.
So nice and warm in here.
That must be my Jax.
Sit down, Martha.
Where is he taking her?
Where…
…is he taking her?
[groans] Eagle Bay.
And then where?
[Tony] I don't know.
I swear. That's all I know.
translation.it: Lo giuro. È tutto quello che so.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
Things, uh…
escalated.
[sighs] Jax. What'd I tell you about that?
Gerry, he say anything about Vee before you killed him?
translation.it: Gerry ha detto qualcosa su Vee prima che tu lo uccidessi?

translation.en: Not a word.
Here. Take this outside. Go through it.
Hello? Come on!
Turn that thing off.
-We might be able to reach the sheriff. -Not in this weather.
translation.it: - Magari raggiungiamo lo sceriffo. - Non con questo tempo.

translation.en: More likely it'll tip off Philip.
-What channel would the emergency-- -Don't argue with me. Leave it.
translation.it: - Su quale canale… - Non discutere. Lascia stare.

translation.en: Unbelievable.
You know, I was in the Girl Scouts, too.
Got my archery badge, pen pal, first aid.
translation.it: Ho i distintivi del tiro con l'arco, amico di penna, pronto soccorso.

translation.en: There wasn't one for hand-to-hand combat or murder with household objects.
translation.it: Non esistevano per la lotta corpo a corpo o l'omicidio con utensili.

translation.en: Really? Must've just been my troop, then.
translation.it: Davvero? Sarà stata la mia squadra, allora.

translation.en: What branch of the military were you in?
CIA.
26 years in the field.
A spy?
-Wouldn't have guessed that. -Be a shit spy if you did.
translation.it: - Non l'avrei mai sospettato. - Sarei una spia di merda.

translation.en: -Come on, Jax. -[whines]
-[Vee] Daddy? -[Philip] Yeah!
I need to pee.
-[Philip] Can-- can you hold it? -[Vee] Nuh-uh.
-♪ That guide me towards salvation… ♪ -[Philip] Okay. Short break.
-Hello? -[static]
Damn it.
Hello, hello. Is anyone there?
Let's go!
[Philip] Okay, come on, Vee.
Vee?
Let me see?
Yeah. No, he's got-- he's got a bad wing, Vee.
Yeah. You know…
sometimes, in nature, when a…
translation.it: a volte, in natura, quando una…

translation.en: creature's damaged…
there's nothing you can do to save them.
translation.it: non puoi far niente per salvarla.

translation.en: It's almost like they were meant to die.
translation.it: È come se fossero destinate a morire.

translation.en: [Vee] But maybe he's just tired.
Maybe. Yeah.
Uh… Here. We'll put him right up here.
-All right. Come on. -Wait, I haven't peed yet.
translation.it: - Ok. Andiamo. - Aspetta, non ho fatto pipì.

translation.en: Come on, Vee. Now!
[Lou] Fuck!
-Fuck. -What's hurtin'?
Nothin'.
Come on. We gotta keep movin'.
-[music stops] -[Philip] Fucking kidding me! Damn it. Fuck!
Hi. We have to walk now, okay?
-I need a break. -Huh?
translation.it: - Ho bisogno di una pausa. - Eh?

translation.en: I need a break to warm up.
translation.it: Mi serve una pausa per riscaldarmi.

translation.en: No time, Lou.
He takes breaks too. I can tell by the tracks. Come on.
translation.it: Anche lui fa pause. Lo capisco dalle tracce. Andiamo.

translation.en: [Lou] Oh, God damn it!
[sighs] Oh shit.
I'm not too cold.
You?
Shit. [gasps]
[Lou] You walked a long way on that. You should've said somethin'.
translation.it: Hai camminato troppo con quel piede. Dovevi dirmelo.

translation.en: And give you an excuse to abandon me?
translation.it: E darti un pretesto per abbandonarmi?

translation.en: Is that for me? No.
Well, can I have some?
Thanks.
And yet you stayed.
Well, should've done somethin'.
[mother] Yeah.
Thanks, Lou. That's… very helpful.
Just saying you could've left him sooner.
What is it you know about being with someone like him?
translation.it: Te ne intendi di relazioni con tipi come lui?

translation.en: So maybe don't tell me what I should have done.
translation.it: Allora non dirmi cos'avrei dovuto fare.

translation.en: I didn't recognize who I was with him.
translation.it: Mentre stavo con lui non mi riconoscevo.

translation.en: I actually felt I could fix him.
You know, when we met, he was loving, he was caring…
translation.it: Sai, quando ci siamo conosciuti, era affettuoso. Era premuroso, ma del tutto instabile.

translation.en: But so broken.
translation.it: Era premuroso, ma del tutto instabile.

translation.en: For so long, I thought… thought it was all me.
translation.it: E credevo che fosse solo colpa mia.

translation.en: I thought…
[sighs] "Why am I failing him? Why isn't my love enough?"
translation.it: perché non riesco ad aiutarlo? Perché il mio amore non basta?

translation.en: I don't know.
That son of a bitch is a monster.
translation.it: Quel figlio di puttana è un mostro.

translation.en: Whatever the hell made him this way.
translation.it: Non so perché sia diventato così,

translation.en: There ain't no amount of love in this entire world
that's gonna be able to save that man.
He ever hurt Vee?
translation.it: Ha mai fatto male a Vee?

translation.en: Not yet.
When he would get into his moods,
translation.it: Quando lui aveva uno dei suoi momenti,

translation.en: I'd whisper to her, "Game on,"
and she'd run and hide.
Actually made it into a… a goddamn game.
translation.it: L'ho trasformato addirittura in un gioco.

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
[sniffling] He always said, if I took Vee away, he'd kill us both.
translation.it: Diceva sempre che se gli avessi portato via Vee, ci avrebbe uccise entrambe.

translation.en: Go on… Tell me what I should've done.
translation.it: Avanti, dimmi cosa avrei dovuto fare.

translation.en: I guess we've all been through things other people will never understand.
translation.it: Abbiamo vissuto situazioni che gli altri non capiranno mai.

translation.en: Hannah?
We'll get her back.
Come on.
[Hannah murmurs] Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
-[panting] -Slow and steady.
Home, Jax.
No arguments. Home. Now!
Oh shit.
How the hell did he do this with Vee?
Gotta climb around it. Oh shit.
-Aah! -Come on!
[Lou] I got you.
[Lou] Good job.
[Lou] Shit.
[groans] Jesus.
[grunts] Not now. God damn it.
-Lou, what's the matter? -Nothing.
-[gasps] -Lou! [screams]
Oh God.
Lou, wake up. Lou.
-Oh… -[coughs]
-[yells] -Oh, thank God.
Let me help you up. -[grunts] Get off me. -[gasps]
I can help you if you just let me.
translation.it: Posso aiutarti, se me lo permetti.

translation.en: [Lou] I don't need your help.
translation.it: Non mi serve il tuo aiuto.

translation.en: -[crack] -[groans] Oh, fuck!
[grunts] Get up. We just lost an hour on him.
Hey, I told you to leave that behind.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di lasciarlo perdere.

translation.en: Storm's passed. I'm gonna climb up to that hilltop.
translation.it: La tempesta è finita. Voglio salire sulla collina e provare a collegarmi.

translation.en: -Try to connect. -There's no time.
translation.it: La tempesta è finita. Voglio salire sulla collina e provare a collegarmi. Non c'è tempo.

translation.en: God damn it. Can you stop bein' so stubborn? We need help.
translation.it: Piantala di essere così cocciuta. Ci serve aiuto.

translation.en: -There is no one who can help us. -[sighs] Shit.
translation.it: Nessuno può aiutarci. Ci sono solo io. Adesso muoviti.

translation.en: -I'm all you've got. Now keep movin'. -[sighs] Why are you helpin' me, Lou?
translation.it: Nessuno può aiutarci. Ci sono solo io. Adesso muoviti. - Perché mi stai aiutando, Lou? - Eagle Bay è vicina.

translation.en: -Huh? -Eagle Bay's just ahead.
translation.it: - Perché mi stai aiutando, Lou? - Eagle Bay è vicina.

translation.en: -Don't slow me down. -God damn it.
[sighs] We missed them.
No one's comin' or goin' in water this rough.
translation.it: Nessuno parte o arriva, con un mare così.

translation.en: -[Hannah] Then what's his plan? -Over here.
translation.it: Allora qual è il suo piano? Da questa parte.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Hannah] Vee!
-Where did you take her? -Stop.
-[muffled sobs] -He's fucking with you.
We can do this all day.
[Lou] Maybe you're right. Maybe we do need help.
translation.it: Forse hai ragione. Forse ci serve davvero aiuto.

translation.en: Go back to that hill.
See if you can raise Rankin. Emergency services are channel 16.
translation.it: Prova a contattare Rankin. Servizi di emergenza, canale 16.

translation.en: Meet me back here when you're done.
Thank you.
What are you gonna do?
[Lou] I need to rest. [gasping] Go on.
Hey, hold up.
Try not to blow your brains out.
translation.it: Cerca di non spararti in testa.

translation.en: There we are. [chuckles]
Frozen in time.
Together forever.
Wanna do another one?
Did you know…
that there are handprints like these in caves all over the world?
translation.it: che ci sono impronte come queste nelle caverne di tutto il mondo?

translation.en: And long after you and Mommy and I are all dead…
translation.it: E secoli dopo che tu, mamma e io saremo morti,

translation.en: these handprints are still gonna be here.
[groans] Hello?
[Hannah, breaking up] Hello? Can anyone hear me? Hello?
Can anybody hear me?
Hello?
Hello, anybody?
-God damn it. -This is Sheriff Rankin.
translation.it: C'è qualcuno? Maledizione. Sceriffo Rankin. Chi parla? Passo.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who is this? Over.
Sheriff! [laughs] Sheriff Rankin.
Oh God. Thank God. This is-- this is Hannah Dawson.
translation.it: Oddio. Meno male. Sono Hannah Dawson.

translation.en: [breaking up] …kidnapped. Kidnapped?
Hannah, can you hear me? Can you repeat that, please?
translation.it: Hannah, mi senti? Puoi ripeterlo, per favore?

translation.en: Uh-- Okay. [gasps] My daughter was kidnapped by her father.
translation.it: Mia figlia è stata rapita da suo padre.

translation.en: Lou Adell is with me… Hannah, can you please confirm?
translation.it: - Lou Adell è con me. - Hannah, puoi confermare?

translation.en: [breaking up] Hannah Dawson? Can you hear me? What?
Say that… say that again?
-Come on, come on, come on. -[static]
Sheriff?
[sighs] Oh fuck. Okay…
Shit.
Torres, come in.
-[Torres] Go, Sheriff. -Listen, we got a situation.
This is gonna sound a bit crazy,
but I think Hannah Dawson's daughter has been kidnapped by… by her father.
translation.it: ma credo che la figlia di Hannah Dawson sia stata rapita dal padre.

translation.en: What?
Listen, let's put it on the wire, right away, in case she's taken off the island.
translation.it: Diramiamo subito un comunicato, casomai la porti via dall'isola.

translation.en: Okay? Hannah and Vee Dawson and Lou Adell. I think she mentioned Lou.
translation.it: Ok? Hannah e Vee Dawson e Lou Adell. Credo abbia menzionato Lou.

translation.en: The guns.
Slowly.
Hello, Philip.
Don't worry about her.
I've made sure she'll sleep through this.
translation.it: Ho fatto in modo che dorma profondamente.

translation.en: Just tell me one thing. And be honest here.
translation.it: Dimmi solo una cosa e sii sincera.

translation.en: Why'd you sell me out?
I knew you'd track down Hannah and Vee sooner or later.
translation.it: Sapevo che avresti rintracciato Hannah e Vee.

translation.en: I wasn't gonna be able to protect them forever.
Protect them? [scoffs] All of this is happening because of you.
translation.it: Proteggerle? Sei tu la responsabile di questo.

translation.en: Okay? And Hannah may be too naive to-- to see it, but I don't.
translation.it: Ok? Hannah sarà troppo ingenua per capirlo, ma io no.

translation.en: Hannah doesn't know who I am.
You still can't even admit I'm your son.
translation.it: E tu non ammetti che sono tuo figlio.

translation.en: So what's the plan, Philip? Why the elaborate chase?
translation.it: Qual è il piano, Philip? Il senso dell'inseguimento?

translation.en: Why let us track you? You don't wanna hurt your kid.
translation.it: E farti trovare? Fai rischiare la bambina.

translation.en: Did you know that Vee is the same age as I was when those-- those men took me?
translation.it: Vee ha la stessa età che avevo io quando quegli uomini mi presero.

translation.en: Yeah, but they weren't as nice as, uh…
as I'm being to her.
translation.it: come lo sono io con lei.

translation.en: Can you appreciate that? The symmetry of that?
I thought my mommy was comin' back to save me, too.
translation.it: Pure io pensavo che mamma mi avrebbe salvato.

translation.en: It was a trap. If I'd tried to save you, they would have had us both.
translation.it: Era una trappola. L'avessi fatto, ci avrebbero presi entrambi.

translation.en: Bullshit. You wanted to maintain your cover. I was a pawn for your mission. Nothin' else.
translation.it: No, proteggevi la tua copertura. Ero solo una pedina per la tua missione.

translation.en: -I had you rescued. I got you out of Iran. -Then why didn't you come back with me?
translation.it: Ti ho salvato. Ti ho fatto uscire dall'Iran. E perché non sei tornata da me? Te lo dico io.

translation.en: Here's why.
translation.it: E perché non sei tornata da me? Te lo dico io.

translation.en: Because you chose the fucking CIA over your own child.
translation.it: Perché hai preferito quella cazzo di CIA a tuo figlio.

translation.en: Yeah, how'd that work out for you? Hmm?
I mean, did you guys fuck up anything worse than you fucked up Iran?
translation.it: Avete rovinato qualcosa in modo peggiore dell'Iran?

translation.en: And then you steal my wife and-- and my kid--
translation.it: E poi hai preso mia moglie e mia figlia…

translation.en: Hannah and Vee had nothing to do with my mistakes. Leave them out of this.
translation.it: Non c'entrano con i miei errori. Lasciale fuori.

translation.en: Oh, spare me the fuckin' morality lesson.
You gave up that right a long time ago.
translation.it: Non hai più quel diritto da tempo.

translation.en: It's not too late.
You move, I'mma put a bullet in you.
translation.it: Se ti muovi, ti becchi un proiettile.

translation.en: It's not too late.
Leave Vee with me and go.
translation.it: Lascia Vee con me e vattene.

translation.en: I'll throw them off your trail.
Philip, listen to me.
You're right.
I didn't protect you when you were a kid. So let me do it now.
translation.it: Non ti ho protetto quand'eri piccolo, lasciamelo fare ora.

translation.en: Shut up.
What, you wanna kill me?
Do it.
Before I knew you took Vee last night, I had my rifle pressed against my head. I'm not afraid to go.
translation.it: Prima che tu rapissi Vee, stavo per spararmi alla testa. Non temo la morte.

translation.en: [mumbles] You just can't stop messin' with my head, can't you? Kid, I wouldn't even know where to start.
translation.it: - Cerchi sempre di spiazzarmi, eh? - Non saprei nemmeno da dove iniziare.

translation.en: The minute I heard you blew yourself up, I knew it was time.
translation.it: Seppi che ti eri fatto esplodere e capii che era ora.

translation.en: I thought Hannah and Vee were safe. My mission was complete.
translation.it: Pensavo Hannah e Vee fossero salve. Missione completa.

translation.en: But you tricked me there, didn't you?
You always were smarter than me.
Beat my ass at chess when you were five years old.
translation.it: Mi hai battuta a scacchi a cinque anni.

translation.en: Remember that?
I do.
You know what?
For once, we're playin' my game.
translation.it: Per una volta, giochiamo al mio gioco.

translation.en: It's time to end this legacy.
Put this whole family out of its misery.
Philip, you're her father.
And you're my mother.
Mom! Mom!
We'll be waiting for you at the lighthouse.
Make sure you bring Hannah.
translation.it: Fa' in modo che ci sia Hannah.

translation.en: Don't take too long.
Fuck.
[man on radio] Just checking in on ya. How are you doing out there?
translation.it: Volevo solo controllare. Come va lì?

translation.en: -Talk to me, Deputy. -Still no hits on the APBs.
translation.it: Parla, vice. L'avviso non ha dato frutti.

translation.en: I notified ATF about the bomb in the truck and the coroner about the body.
translation.it: Ho detto all'ATF della bomba e al coroner del corpo.

translation.en: They're sending teams when the weather lets up.
translation.it: Manderanno squadre appena il tempo migliora.

translation.en: Orcas Island Sheriff's Department.
Yes, sir.
Sheriff, it's the federal marshals.
-This is Rankin. Who's this? -Sheriff, Dominick Crown here.
translation.it: Rankin. Chi parla? Sceriffo, sono Dominick Crown. Ha ricevuto il nostro fax?

translation.en: Did you receive our facsimile transmission?
translation.it: Sceriffo, sono Dominick Crown. Ha ricevuto il nostro fax?

translation.en: Yeah, I got it right here.
We've seen the APB for the woman you know as Lou Adell.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto l'avviso sulla cosiddetta Lou Adell.

translation.en: Is she a match for the person in that photo?
[Rankin] Yeah. Yeah, it sure looks like her.
-How confident are you, Sheriff? -It's her.
translation.it: - Ne è proprio sicuro, sceriffo? - È lei.

translation.en: -[fax machine whirs] -And the second individual?
translation.it: - Ne è proprio sicuro, sceriffo? - È lei. E il secondo individuo?

translation.en: -[bleep] -[Rankin] Hang on one second.
Do you recognize him?
No. Are you telling me that this guy is involved?
translation.it: No. Mi sta dicendo che quest'uomo è coinvolto?

translation.en: Do you have any intel on the location of these individuals?
translation.it: Sapete dove si trovano questi individui?

translation.en: -Are they together? -Well, I don't know if they're together.
What I believe is that they're headed to Eagle Bay, on the west side of our island.
translation.it: Credo siano diretti a Eagle Bay, sul lato ovest dell'isola.

translation.en: We need to make sure no civilians go anywhere near that location.
translation.it: Bisogna far sì che nessun civile si avvicini.

translation.en: Set up roadblocks and cordon the area.
translation.it: Posti di blocco e area isolata.

translation.en: There's a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.it: Lì ci sono una bambina rapita e sua madre.

translation.en: -Hold. -Excuse me?
Asshole put me on hold. Unbelievable.
translation.it: Quello stronzo mi ha messo in attesa. Incredibile.

translation.en: Un-fuckin'-believable.
-[marshal] Sheriff Rankin? -Yeah, right here.
The male fugitive is US Army Special Forces,
translation.it: Il fuggitivo è delle Forze Speciali USA,

translation.en: convicted in the murder of numerous civilians.
translation.it: condannato per l'omicidio di alcuni civili.

translation.en: The female is a high-priority target for the CIA.
translation.it: La donna è un obiettivo prioritario della CIA.

translation.en: The CIA? Lou Adell?
This investigation is now under the jurisdiction of the US Marshals.
translation.it: L'indagine è ora sotto giurisdizione federale.

translation.en: Lethal force has been authorized.
Do not allow any approach to Eagle Bay.
translation.it: Accesso proibito a Eagle Bay. Al suo reparto e…

translation.en: -Not by your department, not-- -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.it: Accesso proibito a Eagle Bay. Al suo reparto e… Lì ci sono una bambina rapita e sua madre.

translation.en: There-- there is a kidnapped girl and her mother out there.
translation.it: Lì ci sono una bambina rapita e sua madre.

translation.en: Stay out of our way, Sheriff.
[Hannah] Lou, sorry it took me so long.
translation.it: Lou, scusa se ci ho messo tanto.

translation.en: I tried to get as high as I could, but…
translation.it: Ho cercato di salire più in alto che potevo, ma…

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus. Oh shit.
Oh God, oh God, oh God. Okay, wait, wait. Let me help. Let me help.
translation.it: Oddio. Ok, aspetta. Lascia che ti aiuti.

translation.en: -Did he do this? -[groans]
And Vee? Is she… is she all right?
She's okay for now. He's taking her to the lighthouse.
translation.it: Sta bene, per ora. La sta portando al faro.

translation.en: -Okay, wait, wait, wait. -Wait. -Move your hand right now. -Okay…
Do it quick--
-[groans] -Oh shit.
-Pack the wound. -I'm coming. I'm coming. I'm coming.
translation.it: Oh, merda! Chiudi la ferita. Ci sono.

translation.en: Fill it with gauze. As-- as much as you can.
translation.it: Riempila di garza il più possibile.

translation.en: -Oh shit. -Come on, deeper.
translation.it: - Oh, merda. - Forza, più a fondo. Riempila bene.

translation.en: -Really pack it in. [grunts] -I'm trying.
translation.it: - Oh, merda. - Forza, più a fondo. Riempila bene. Ci sto provando. Gesù, Lou. Mi dispiace di averti coinvolto.

translation.en: -[groans] -Jesus, Lou. -I'm so sorry I dragged you into this. -[moans]
translation.it: Ci sto provando. Gesù, Lou. Mi dispiace di averti coinvolto.

translation.en: Put your hand here. Right. Press down. Okay, good. I gotta-- I gotta grab some tape.
translation.it: Metti la mano qui. Premi. Prendo del nastro adesivo.

translation.en: Hannah. Did you reach the sheriff?
-Uh, I don't know. -Leave it.
-[Hannah] Wait, uh-- -It's fine.
I found those at the cabin. I meant to tell you.
You're lying.
This message isn't for me, is it?
translation.it: Questo messaggio non è per me, vero?

translation.en: [sighs] None of them are.
Say it.
I need you to say it.
Say it!
He's… my son.
When I was stationed in Iran, I had to get close to a very dangerous man.
translation.it: Quand'ero di stanza in Iran, dovetti avvicinarmi a un uomo molto pericoloso.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Very close.
No, no, no, no.
I kept the baby to keep my cover.
translation.it: Ho tenuto il bimbo per salvare la copertura.

translation.en: You mean… you mean Philip? The baby? You mean your son?
translation.it: Intendi Philip? Il tuo bambino? Tuo figlio?

translation.en: So what is this? Some game?
You fucking with me? What, you tell him where we were, or…
translation.it: Mi prendi in giro? Aspetta, gli hai detto dov'eravamo?

translation.en: -What-- what is this? -No. I wasn't helping him.
translation.it: - No. - Di che si tratta? Non aiutavo lui.

translation.en: -I was helping you. You and Vee. -Stop lying to me.
translation.it: - Aiutavo te e Vee. - Basta bugie.

translation.en: -Tell me the goddamn truth! -[yells]
I got you to this island.
translation.it: Ho fatto sì che ti trasferissi qui.

translation.en: Your old friend from college?
The one who told you about the beautiful secluded place on Orcas Island
translation.it: che ti ha parlato del bel posticino isolato dall'affitto irrisorio sull'Isola di Orcas?

translation.en: with the cheap rent?
I had her run into you on the street. [sighs]
translation.it: Ho combinato io il vostro incontro.

translation.en: I tried to stop him.
I blackmailed the CIA
translation.it: Ho ricattato la CIA perché avviasse un'indagine

translation.en: to force an investigation into what he did in El Salvador.
translation.it: Ho ricattato la CIA perché avviasse un'indagine sui suoi misfatti a El Salvador.

translation.en: -You think you saved us? -I knew he'd track you eventually.
translation.it: - Credi di averci salvate? - Sapevo che vi avrebbe trovate.

translation.en: You didn't save us. I got Vee away from him.
translation.it: Non ci hai salvate. Ho portato Vee lontano da lui.

translation.en: I took care of her every goddamn day and made sure she was safe.
translation.it: Mi sono sempre occupata di lei, tenendola al sicuro.

translation.en: Now she's out there with him because of you.
translation.it: Ora lei è con lui per colpa tua.

translation.en: You're no damn hero. You're a fucking coward.
translation.it: Non sei un'eroina! Sei una vigliacca!

translation.en: -Wow. -All that rage that that man felt.
All the rage inside of that man that he felt,
translation.it: Tutta la rabbia che aveva dentro

translation.en: that he aimed towards me, is because of you.
translation.it: e che riversava su di me, è a causa tua!

translation.en: Not everybody is meant to be a mother.
translation.it: Non ogni donna è portata a essere madre.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe not.
But you could have been a little more human.
translation.it: Ma potevi essere un po' più umana.

translation.en: You drove past our trailer every day.
translation.it: Ogni giorno passavi davanti a casa nostra.

translation.en: You drove past your own granddaughter, Lou.
translation.it: Ogni giorno passavi davanti a casa nostra. A tua nipote, Lou.

translation.en: You didn't talk to her. You didn't speak to her.
You didn't look at her.
What kind of person could do that to their own family?
translation.it: Che razza di persona farebbe una cosa così ai suoi?

translation.en: [grunts] Come on. We gotta keep moving.
There ain't no more "we."
Hannah, you don't know where they're going.
translation.it: Hannah, non sai dove stanno andando.

translation.en: You said the lighthouse. I'll follow the coastline.
translation.it: Hai detto il faro, no? Seguirò la costa.

translation.en: Not on your own. It's a trap.
translation.it: Non da sola. È una trappola.

translation.en: -Please. There's one thing I'm good for. -Not anymore.
translation.it: Ti prego. Ti sarò utile. Non più.

translation.en: You'll just slow me down.
[Philip screaming] Mama! Mama! Mama! Mom!
-Jax. -[barking]
-[grunts] -[Rankin] Lou!
Are you okay?
Never thought I'd be excited to see you.
translation.it: Non avrei mai pensato di essere felice di vederti.

translation.en: -First time for everything. -[sighs]
translation.it: C'è sempre una prima volta. Hannah?

translation.en: -Where's Hannah? -On her way to the lighthouse.
translation.it: C'è sempre una prima volta. Hannah? Sta andando al faro.

translation.en: And her daughter?
translation.it: Sta andando al faro. E sua figlia?

translation.en: -Already there with the… -Okay.
…the kidnapper.
He's armed. Very dangerous.
That's exactly what the feds said about you.
translation.it: I federali hanno detto la stessa cosa su di te.

translation.en: You stay here. I'll send someone for you as soon as the road's clear.
translation.it: Sta' qui. Manderò qualcuno appena le strade riaprono.

translation.en: Wait. For fuck's sake, help me outside. I'm suffocating in here.
translation.it: Aspetta. Per la miseria, aiutami a uscire. Soffoco, qui dentro.

translation.en: -Come on. I got this. -[groans]
You gonna tell me why the CIA's lookin' for you, Lou?
translation.it: Mi dici perché la CIA ti sta cercando, Lou?

translation.en: [Lou] I used some evidence I held onto.
translation.it: Ho usato delle prove che avevo conservato.

translation.en: -[groans] -What kind of evidence?
Documents. Proving CIA involvement in the coup in Iran.
translation.it: Prove sul coinvolgimento della CIA nel colpo di Stato in Iran.

translation.en: Ah. I can see why they'd be pissed about that. -[sighs] -Lou, they're on their way.
translation.it: Ovvio che s'incazzino. Lou, stanno arrivando.

translation.en: [Lou] Fuck, they won't care about collateral damage.
translation.it: Cazzo. Non gli fregherà dei danni collaterali.

translation.en: You gotta get Hannah and Vee out of there.
translation.it: Devi portar via Hannah e Vee.

translation.en: [Lou] Come on.
[groans] This thing starts up again, I'm gonna bleed out.
Will you get the first-aid kit? I left it in there.
translation.it: Mi porti il kit di pronto soccorso? È lì dentro.

translation.en: [grunts] Okay.
Lou! Lou!
You gotta be kidding me.
[yells] Lou!
[Vee screams] Mommy!
-[Vee] Mommy! -[Hannah] Vee!
-[Vee] Come! Please, come! -[panting]
-Vee! -I'm here, Mama!
-Up here! -I'm coming!
[breathing heavily] Baby?
-Mommy! -[Hannah laughs]
Hi, Mommy.
[sighs] Hi, baby.
We were afraid you weren't gonna show up. Weren't we, Vee?
translation.it: Temevamo che non saresti venuta. Vero?

translation.en: You okay?
Of course she's okay. She's with her daddy.
translation.it: Ma certo che sta bene. È col suo papà.

translation.en: Come, give Mommy a hug.
Hey, how's-- how's Lou doin'? Is she-- Is she on her way?
Jesus, look at me. [chuckles]
Still waitin' for my mommy to come back after all these years, huh?
translation.it: Aspetto ancora che la mamma torni dopo tutti questi anni.

translation.en: But we do need her here to finish this.
translation.it: Ma ci serve lei per concludere.

translation.en: I wanna give Mommy a hug.
Philip, please.
[Vee] Please, Daddy?
One quick hug while we wait for Lou.
translation.it: Un abbraccio veloce mentre aspettiamo Lou.

translation.en: [laughing] Oh, I missed you so much.
[whispers] Game on.
Daddy, may I go to the bathroom?
[Philip] Of course you can, Vee.
But hey… Come right back, okay?
Wow, Lou is really rubbin' off on you.
translation.it: Wow, Lou ti ha davvero plagiata.

translation.en: Come on, just give me the gun. We both know you're not gonna shoot me.
translation.it: Dai, dammi la pistola. Sappiamo che non mi sparerai.

translation.en: You don't know me, Phil. You never did.
translation.it: Tu non mi conosci, Phil. - Non mi hai mai conosciuta. - No?

translation.en: [Philip] No?
translation.it: - Non mi hai mai conosciuta. - No?

translation.en: I know that if you were gonna shoot me, you would have done it years ago.
translation.it: Se avessi voluto spararmi, l'avresti fatto anni fa.

translation.en: I know that you're not like Lou and me.
translation.it: So che non sei come me e Lou.

translation.en: You're not.
Yeah, 'cause she would've shot me already.
translation.it: Sì, perché mi avresti già sparato.

translation.en: Come on. Give me the gun.
You abandon me, and then you steal my baby from me,
translation.it: Mi abbandoni, mi prendi la bambina e poi mi spari?

translation.en: and now you shoot me?
translation.it: mi prendi la bambina e poi mi spari?

translation.en: That shit won't work on me. Not gonna work on me anymore, Phil.
translation.it: I tuoi trucchi non fanno più effetto su di me, Phil.

translation.en: [shudders] I'm not afraid of you anymore.
translation.it: Non ho più paura di te.

translation.en: And I won't let you hurt my little girl the way you hurt me.
translation.it: E non farai soffrire la mia bambina come hai fatto soffrire me.

translation.en: -Hannah! -[gasping]
Do you remember?
Do you remember…
how it felt?
[shakily] Yeah. [gasping] I remember.
Vee! We have to run!
Vee!
[Hannah] Oh shit.
Game's over, okay? Come here, Little Rabbit.
translation.it: Abbiamo finito di giocare. Vieni, Leprotta.

translation.en: [groans] We gotta go right now.
Oh! Oh, baby. Come on. Get up. Are you okay?
Did he hurt you? He didn't hurt you, right?
translation.it: Non ti ha fatto del male, vero?

translation.en: Oh! Hide. Hide. Hide.
-Hannah. -[Hannah] Come on.
-[clattering] -We need to move.
-[Philip] Vee? -[gasps]
-My gun. -[Hannah] Lost it.
-Knife? -Stuck in Philip's hand.
translation.it: - Il coltello. - È dentro la mano di Philip.

translation.en: Try that hatch. Go, go, now.
-Wait, your jacket's stuck. -[Lou] Oh fuck.
translation.it: Ti si è impigliata la giacca. Oh, cazzo.

translation.en: [Hannah] Push you up.
Run to the end of the beach. -Run as fast as you can. -No!
translation.it: Corri fino alla fine della spiaggia. Più veloce che puoi.

translation.en: -I'll meet you there. -Don't leave me.
We won't fit. You gotta run now. Go, go, go, go. Run, Little Rabbit! Run!
translation.it: Devi andare subito. Corri, Leprotta, corri!

translation.en: [Lou] It's rigged. I can't defuse it.
Could buy us some time if I can change the frequency.
translation.it: Se cambio la frequenza guadagneremo tempo.

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -[panting]
One of us was actually a Girl Scout.
translation.it: Una di noi era davvero una Girl Scout.

translation.en: -Do you still have the radio? -Yeah.
Maybe we can use it after all. Go bust that gate open.
translation.it: Forse potremo ancora usarla. Sfonda quel cancello.

translation.en: [Philip] Lou?
We're all here.
We're all here.
I was hoping that we could all do this together.
translation.it: Speravo che potessimo farlo tutti insieme,

translation.en: -Face to face! -[bleeping]
So that we could end this… the right way.
translation.it: per poter concludere tutto nel modo giusto.

translation.en: End this right.
As a family.
As a family.
But sometimes, you don't get what you want.
translation.it: Ma a volte non ottieni ciò che vuoi.

translation.en: Fuck!
-[gasping] -[Philip yells] Fuck!
[screams] Fuck! You fuckin' let me in!
Oh shit.
-[Lou] Oh shit. -[Hannah] What?
-[Lou] The CIA's on the hunt. -[barks]
[panting] They comin' for Philip or you?
They won't want either one of us to leave here alive.
translation.it: Non lascerà vivo nessuno dei due.

translation.en: -Go, go. -No.
-I'll just slow you down. -I'm not gonna leave you here.
translation.it: - No. Ti farò rallentare. - Non ti lascio qui.

translation.en: Lou, go get your granddaughter to safety. I'll catch up.
translation.it: Porta tua nipote al sicuro. Vi raggiungo dopo.

translation.en: [yells] Fuck!
Vee…
Oh! Come here.
You're a brave little girl. You know that?
translation.it: Sei una bambina coraggiosa, lo sai?

translation.en: Good. Help me up, will you?
Okay, listen to me. I want you to go grab a stick, okay?
translation.it: Ok, ascoltami. Devi prendere un bel bastone, ok?

translation.en: The longest one you can find. Go, go, go.
translation.it: Il più lungo che trovi. Vai.

translation.en: -Mommy! -Hey, baby.
Hannah. The radio.
[Hannah] In my pocket.
-[Lou] Come on. -[Hannah] Help me.
-All right. -Come on, go, run.
Hannah, hold this up as high as you can.
-[Hannah] Are you calling for help? -[Lou] Yeah.
[Lou] Yeah. That ought to get their attention.
You gotta go. Take the road back towards town.
translation.it: Devi andare. Prendi la strada che va in città. Porta con te Jax.

translation.en: -Bring Jax with you. -You… you come with us.
translation.it: Prendi la strada che va in città. Porta con te Jax. Vieni con noi.

translation.en: Hannah, you take care of your kid…
translation.it: Hannah, tu occupati di tua figlia,

translation.en: I'll take care of mine.
I left a letter for you at my house. Make sure you find it.
translation.it: Ti ho lasciato una lettera a casa mia. Vedi di trovarla.

translation.en: Okay. Go on, Vee.
Oh, God damn it.
Don't die on me now, Lou.
Everything that matters is right here in front of you.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che importa è qui davanti a te.

translation.en: I know.
Go. Now!
I'm sorry, kid.
-Hey, Vee. -[Vee] Hey.
[Rankin] Hello, Jax.
Hey, you got two bracelets now.
Yeah. Just like you.
One's for a friend.
[man] So, out of the blue, she just leaves you and your daughter this house?
translation.it: Quindi ha lasciato la casa a lei a e sua figlia?

translation.en: Mm-hm. Yeah, this house and a ton of frozen deer meat.
translation.it: Sì, la casa e un quintale di carne di cervo surgelata.

translation.en: It's open.
-Hey, Han. -[Hannah] Hey.
Oh, hello.
You guys still around?
We had a few more questions for Ms. Dawson here.
translation.it: Avevamo ancora qualche domanda per la sig.na Dawson.

translation.en: Oh. I hope I'm not interrupting.
translation.it: Avevamo ancora qualche domanda per la sig.na Dawson. Scusate se interrompo.

translation.en: [clears throat] Hannah, uh, coroner's got an issue.
translation.it: Hannah, ho una richiesta del medico legale.

translation.en: You're next of kin. He needs a signature to release Philip's body for burial.
translation.it: Sei parente stretta e devi firmare per la sepoltura di Philip.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Yeah. Sorry.
Ms. Dawson, did Lou Adell ever mention
translation.it: Sig.na Dawson, Lou Adell ha mai menzionato

translation.en: anything about documents from her time in the CIA to you?
translation.it: Sig.na Dawson, Lou Adell ha mai menzionato documenti risalenti al suo periodo nella CIA?

translation.en: She'd be a pretty shit spy if she did.
translation.it: Sarebbe stata una pessima spia, no?

translation.en: If you think of anything…
translation.it: Se le viene in mente qualcosa…

translation.en: [chuckles] You gave me a card last time you were here, and the time before that.
translation.it: Mi ha dato il suo biglietto le altre due volte che è stata qui.

translation.en: Anything at all.
All right.
-[agent] Sheriff. -Good to see you again.
-Forget them. -Mm.
Looks like you two are ready for Seattle.
translation.it: Pare che siate pronte per trasferirvi a Seattle.

translation.en: Yeah, you're all packed up.
translation.it: Pare che siate pronte per trasferirvi a Seattle. È tutto imballato.

translation.en: Yeah, almost.
I wanted to tell you, you just did a beautiful job with the memorial service.
translation.it: Volevo dirti che la cerimonia funebre è stata eccezionale.

translation.en: -Stop. -No, you did. And I think Lou would have really appreciated it.
[scoffs] Come on now. All that sincere emotion would have made her puke.
translation.it: Ma dai. Tutte quelle pure emozioni l'avrebbero fatta vomitare.

translation.en: Oh, well…
-She was her own person. -Mm-hm.
I mean, sometimes, I'm just so damn mad at her, and then…
translation.it: Sì, beh… A volte penso a lei e mi arrabbio, e…

translation.en: [sighs] Other times I miss her.
Isn't that just how it is with family?
[Lou] "I've never been one for many words, so I'll keep this short."
translation.it: Non ho mai amato dilungarmi, quindi sarò breve.

translation.en: "The house is yours. Sell it."
"There's a month's worth of meat for Jax in the freezer, and some cash for you."
translation.it: Nel freezer troverai carne per Jax per un mese e dei soldi per te.

translation.en: "Life doesn't give you second chances, but sometimes it does offer a fresh start."
translation.it: La vita non offre seconde possibilità, ma a volte permette di ricominciare.

translation.en: "Hannah, you're going to wonder why I did it." "Why I left this all for you."
translation.it: Hannah, ti chiederai perché l'ho fatto. Perché ti ho lasciato tutto questo.

translation.en: "The simple answer is,
you'll leave the world a better place than I did."
translation.it: lascerai un mondo migliore di quello che ho lasciato io.
